introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: FIS-Learn ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our e-learning platform.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly: name, email address, profile information, and payment details. We also automatically collect usage data such as course progress, video playback events, and device information to improve your learning experience.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use your data to provide and improve our services, personalize your learning experience, process payments, send course-related notifications, and communicate important updates. We never sell your personal data to third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and platform functionality. With your consent, we may also use analytics cookies to understand usage patterns and third-party cookies for video playback. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through the cookie settings banner.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: You have the right to access, export, and delete your personal data. You can export all your data from Settings > Data Export, and request account deletion from Settings > Delete Account. Deletion requests include a 30-day grace period during which you can cancel. After 30 days, all personal data is permanently removed.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your data rights, contact us at privacy@fislearn.com or through the contact page on our website.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using FIS-Learn, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials. You must be at least 16 years old to create an account. Sharing account access is prohibited.

content.title: Content & Intellectual Property
content.content: All course content, including videos, text, code, and assessments, is the intellectual property of FIS-Learn or its instructors. You may access content for personal learning purposes only. Redistributing, copying, or reselling course content is strictly prohibited.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions & Payments
subscriptions.content: Paid subscriptions are billed according to the plan you select. You may cancel at any time, and your access continues until the end of the current billing period. Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis within 14 days of purchase.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms, engage in abusive behavior, or misuse the platform. You may delete your account at any time through the Settings page.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FIS-Learn provides educational content on an "as-is" basis. We do not guarantee specific learning outcomes or employment results. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for services in the 12 months preceding any claim.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@fislearn.com or through the contact page on our website.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how FIS Academy uses cookies and similar technologies to recognise you when you visit our platform.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small data files placed on your device. They help us remember your preferences, keep you logged in, and understand how you use our platform.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.essential: Essential Cookies – Required for core site functionality such as login sessions and security. These cannot be disabled.
types.analytics: Analytics Cookies – Help us understand how visitors interact with the site so we can improve your experience.
types.preference: Preference Cookies – Remember your settings such as language and theme.

control.title: How to Control Cookies
control.content: You can control and/or delete cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may prevent parts of the site from functioning correctly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@fis-learn.com.

questions.q: Is FIS Academy free to use?
questions.a: Yes! You can access all free courses without paying anything. A Pro subscription unlocks premium courses and features.

questions.q: How do I get a certificate?
questions.a: Complete all lessons in a course and pass the final assessment. A certificate will be automatically generated for you.

questions.q: Can I learn at my own pace?
questions.a: Absolutely. All pre-recorded courses are available 24/7 and you can progress at whatever speed suits you.
Our platform supports English and Arabic. Course content varies by language — check each course page for availability.

questions.q: How do I become an instructor?
questions.a: Visit our Become an Instructor page, apply with a sample lesson, and our team will review your application within 5 business days.
